messages.message: Are there specific use cases you have in mind? `scan_line`  has been around forever, `scan_near`  is recent but I would not blindly suggest it, we’ve invested a lot more in `scan_box`  improvements but like with any function that is not determinstic, there might be cases where you don’t see it working as expected.

No but it’s good to learn how to use them in a live demo. I am so used to just scan_right XYZ 
It’s always great to have the knowledge in a live demo to quickly show capabilities
